description: In Spike Flight, you'll test your reflexes as you leap from platform to platform, dodging deadly spikes and climbing to new heights. The goal is simple: stay alive as long as possible and set an unbeatable high score! Control your character with the left and right arrow keys, and challenge your friends to see who can soar the highest. Are you ready to take flight and dodge the spikes?
instructions: Instructions:1. Use the left arrow key to move left.2. Use the right arrow key to move right.
title: Spike Flight
